segments.text: I notice the water overflowing, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so close to falling, and he doesn’t even realize it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just watching him, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really do something before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading fast, and soon the whole kitchen will be soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, like nothing bad could ever happen there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the children behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like it’s about to collapse at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe no one has reacted yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
